Detailed Description

Cover Page service provider interface used by the ciphers.

This interface allows for service consumers to be agnostic of the service implementations.

Member Function Documentation

◆ getAccessDeniedPage()

virtual array<byte> ^ IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoCoverPageServices::getAccessDeniedPage ( FileType  fileType)
pure virtual

Abstract interface of the Get Access Denied Page service function.

Override this with your own implementation that returns custom file data for whichever types you wish to support

Parameters
fileTypeFile type to provide a cover page for (PDF, CSV, etc...)
Returns
Raw page data for the given file type
See also
FileCryptoCoverPageServices::getCoverPage(FileType)

Implemented in IonicSecurity::SDK::FileCryptoCoverPageServicesDefault.
